review_reply.reply_text: Thanks for your views, without investigation it's difficult to decide God bless you, thanks once again

survey_response.review_text: Dr. Vijay Kr Khariwal has provided me **** medicines/treatment after my xray and blood reports and after that too helped me with further consultation when I wasn't in the city, he called and checked if I am still getting relief or any problems I am facing. He saved my leg and spine after being wrongly diagnosed and treated by PT Dinesh Bhardwaj (Activ Ayu Care, Vikaspuri, Delhi), who have almost caused me spinal and shoulder pain from the pain in toe nerve.. I do not feel any problem in daily activities like walking, jogging, etc and I feel more stable now. Just the medicines are a little costly along with tests but this doctor has really explained me the problem and satisfied my doubts. I recommend him.

review_reply.reply_text:
This pt. Having problem in lower back every body was considering slip disc where as it's a different problem I have to have her mri, bone scan usually done in cancer and many blood test to confirm the diagnosis and even biopsy to start proper treatment
I am thankful to patient for understanding the problem and getting the required investigation done. Many patients without understanding their problem start giving bad comment and keep on suffering from disease

survey_response.review_text: I have been experiencing back pain since November of 2013. However, all the doctors I had gone to in Delhi, Mumbai, Bangalore, and United States we’re unable to diagnose anything. Dr. Vijay spotted my problem within 5 minutes me relaying my history. He was super thorough and patient in his examination. He recommended a couple of tests to confirm his suspicion. He is the first one to recommend MRI for pelvis which confirmed his diagnosis. I am super thankful to him as now I can start the treatment for my actual problem. He didn’t dismiss my issues as a simple muscular pain unlike all the doctors I had consulted for the past 5-6 years.

review_reply.reply_text: The child has major injury in the leg above ankle,how one can decide without xray, told to go to nearest,pop back slab first thing, after xray final decision many people because of professional issue tell such things, what was done was absolutely scientific.Sometimes parents are out of emotions over reacting

survey_response.review_text: went to get my son's ankle injury treated. ** **** **** *** ****** **** ****** ** **** ** ******* ** ******** *** ******* doctor insisted on soft plaster, then few x-rays and then either hard plaster or surgery after examining the x-ray results. the ingress and egress to the clinic is not easy, the kid couldn't walk but doctor insisted to go after the soft plaster only, get the x-ray done from the place he refers and come back for hard plaster. when probed more on surgery, that if needed where will it be done, he didn't address it. the soft plaster was nothing but cotton tied to the leg with pattis which costed us a bomb. ****** **** *** *** ** ****** **** ******** *********** **** **** ** *** *** **** ** * ********* ******* ** ***** **** ** * *** *** *** *** *** will not recommend him to others.

review_reply.reply_text: This pt. Had. Intestine problem for which she took steroids for about one month and having pain in knee and hips such pt. Have a condition called as Avascular necrosis head of femoral head her xray hip is showing this and in early stages such changes are difficult to be seen on xray, it's not a case of simple muscle pull only MRI scan can tell or nuclear bone scan, bone density is required as she took steroids for long time that affects strength of bones, so not a single unnecessary investigation, such xray in beginning can be read as normal, so please convince the patient, before publishing, she herself asked from where she should get investigation I suggested two three

survey_response.review_text: NOT AT ALL RECOMMENDED. Bad experience. Patient had a ****** muscle pull for which recommended tests worth 10,000, included 7 x-rays and 6 types of blood tests. Both the reports were normal. Then recommended bone density test, MRI, and some other tests. Even then the doctor said there might be chances of surgery. **** ******* ** *** ** **** **** * *** ** ****** **** *** **** ******* ***** *********** ***** ***** *********** ** *** ****** **** *** **** ******** **** **** ** **** We visited another doctor *** ** *** ********** **** ***** *** **** * ****** **** *** *** ****** ** **** * ***** NOT RECOMMENDEDDDD!! HIGHLY DISAPPOINTED. !!

review_reply.reply_text: Thanks for🙏💕 your Appreciation regards Dr Vijay khariwal, please read OSTEOMYELITIS in second line ist word, acute infection in bone

survey_response.review_text: My 2 months old son was diagnosed by Dr. Kheriwal for Ostromolitas(right hand radius), which no other doctor could diagnose , just in the first visit. He even came  in the middle of night to start the treatment immediately. Later he performed a surgery, which helped to save the right hand of my child. Had the baby not diagnosed and treated on time, without any delay, the child would have lost his right hand. ** ** **** *** ** **. He is out of the very few Doctors, who are always approachable for any emergencies. I highly recommend him for any bones/ortho related issues.

review_reply.reply_text: Thanks🙏🙏🙏 madam for compliment

survey_response.review_text: I was suffering from post MT5 foot fracture trauma and not able to recover from the pain while walking after  5 to 6 months of MT5 foot fracture. So have consulted with Vijay Sir and I am glad that after medication, prescrided by him, I got fully recovered from the pain and able to do all the activies which I was doing before fracture.Lastly thanks a lot Sir.

Thanks🙏 once again

survey_response.review_text: My Friend's Wife Mrs. Devender Jain Was Bed Ridden For The Last 10 Years. She Was Unable To Prepare Food  & Not Even A Cup Of Tea, Doctors Advised Hip & Knee Replacement Fortunately We Came In Contact With Dr. Vijay Khariwal At Ludhiana & With His Treatment With Medicines Only, & his Wife's Started Walking & No Joint Replacement Done She Started Working In Kitchen After Ten Year's. He Assured Us That Patient Will Be Alright With Medicines Only.Through He Himself Doing Joint Replacement We Recommend Everybody To Consult Him Before Going For Joint Replacement & Specially For Pain In Back & Hip Reason & We Have Come To Know That He Has Saved many Patients From Replacement Of Joints.
